page.title: 14Woodhouse Hotel,Princethorpe
page.content: Miss Kelly is the manageress of The Woodhouse at Princethorpe.On Friday morning at 07.30 she is up and about to supervise breakfast.She has 16 staff to supervise.After breakfast,she does a timetable for the next week.She has to allocate staff to different jobs.Next,there is paperwork to be done and the takings from the day before to be collected.The restaurant is then prepared for the evening or tables are set out for weddings on Saturday.At lunchtime she has to check that everything is running smoothly.At 15.00 she finishes and goes to the bank to put money in.She has the afternoon off.At 19.00 she comes back to organise the evening meal.She finishes at about 01.00.
